FuncDef: This command monitors statistics for a VRRP instance.
CLIs: instance interface <interface-name> vr-id <virtual-router-id> [ ipv6 ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the existing IP interface on which VRRP is configured. The name may can up to 32 characters long.
Specifies the virtual router ID for the existing IP interface, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 255.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
